constituent: sagacious, person, streetwalker, Ministry of silly walks, John Cleese, license, elbow, human legs, walking legs
koohiiStory1: The entire town wants to get rid of legal prostitutes, but the sagacious Mr T realizes that they are a benefit to the economy and society. So he lets the sa-geishas stay.
koohiiStory2: (re: sweetneet) Since he is not very sagacious, Mr. T failed his driver´s license and now needs to resort to his walking legs to get around.
